pullrequest.title: Recompilation of resample extension for Python 3.7

content.raw:
The diff is only as noisy as it is because the keys in the JSON have re-ordered. The only non-reordering changes to the json file are entries for the four Python 3.7 platforms being added.
Autocython now sorts the keys to prevent this noise in future.
content.html: The diff is only as noisy as it is because the keys in the JSON have re-ordered. The only non-reordering changes to the json file are entries for the four Python 3.7 platforms being added. Autocython now sorts the keys to prevent this noise in future.
